**Script is good for dust data 2022**
Library
```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(lubridate)
```

Load Data 
```{r}
dust<-read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "tx_master.csv")) 
```

Clean
```{r}
year<- dust %>%
  select(date,SUM) %>%
  filter(between(date, as.Date('2022-02-01'), as.Date('2022-08-28')))

month<- dust %>%
  filter(Type %in% "Monthly") %>%
  filter(between(date, as.Date('2022-02-01'), as.Date('2022-08-28')))
```

Plot
```{r}
year%>%
  ggplot() + geom_line(
    aes(x = date,
        y = SUM)) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = as.Date("2022-07-07"), color = "blue")+
   geom_vline(xintercept = as.Date("2022-07-19"), color = "blue")+
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 month", date_labels = "%b") +
  geom_point(data = month,
             aes(x = date,
                 y = SUM),
             shape = 3,
             size = 4,
             color = "blue")
```
